html: (Mosiah 14:2)."He hath no form nor comeliness; … there is no beauty that we should desire him." "There was nothing about him to cause people to single him out," noted President Joseph Fielding Smith. "In appearance he was like men; and so it is expressed here by the prophet that he had no form or comeliness, that is, he was not so distinctive, so different from others that people would recognize him as the Son of God. He appeared as a mortal man." (DS 1:23.)
